original_title: Presenting The Best Of Buckshot Productions
overview: Collection of five short films from the Buckshot vaults.  Includes: Chute — This legendary film brings together two real giants (Al Parker and Toby) in a once-in-a-lifetime session that is sure to top your list of favorites.  Not Just Friends — Old friends Noel Kemp and Joe Porcelli decide they want to get to know each other more intimately than they did before.  Dark Corners — Derrick Bolen and Erik Russell, sheathed in straps and fittings of black leather, find streams of pleasure in dark corners.  His Own Man — Neal Shaw exercises, strips and shows off his privates, dildos himself with a cucumber and then cums in his own face.  Magic Of Power — As Neal Shaw sleeps, he envisions the kind of man he most desires. How else but in a dream could he experience the magnificence of Frank Vickers?
title: Presenting The Best Of Buckshot Productions
